fields.name: dpl_error_text
fields.fieldText: Data survey sudah complete, mohon lakukan proses komite survey dan credit review selanjutnya.

validationRule.errorMessage: Please input 16 digit number.
Please start the phone number with '628' and contains 7 to 11 digits after '628'.
You must be at least 17 years old.

textTemplates.name: tpl_MIC_City
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, code__c from City_Master_Data__c where province_code__c = '{!editor_MIC_Province1.selectedChoiceValues}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_MIC_Kecamatan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, code__c from District_Master_Data__c where city_code__c = '{!func_MIC_City_Kabupaten}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_MIC_Kelurahan
textTemplates.text: Select Id, Name, code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where district_code__c = '{!func_MIC_Kecamatan}'

textTemplates.name: tpl_MIC_Zipcode
textTemplates.text: Select Zip_Code__c from Sub_District_Master_Data__c where code__c = '{!func_MIC_Kelurahan}'
